name: RoaringsPronounAutoCorrect
description: Roaring's personal pronoun auto-corrector - automatically fixes pronouns in my messages before sending

2.0.0: Complete redesign as personal auto-correction tool
Intercepts MY messages before sending (not a bot)
Option to block messages with wrong pronouns
Smart context awareness and confidence scoring
Multiple pronoun data sources (PronounDB, custom API)
Zero impact on other users - purely client-side
All code written in first person from Roaring's perspective
